rawMetadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.33+commit.64118f21"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256[2]","name":"_pA","type":"uint256[2]"},{"internalType":"uint256[2][2]","name":"_pB","type":"uint256[2][2]"},{"internalType":"uint256[2]","name":"_pC","type":"uint256[2]"},{"internalType":"uint256[5]","name":"_pubSignals","type":"uint256[5]"}],"name":"verifyProof","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Unified ZK voting contract supporting both D1 (Private Voting) and D2 (Quadratic Voting) D1: Standard commit-reveal voting with 1:1 voting power D2: Quadratic voting where cost = numVotes^2 (anti-whale mechanism) Both systems share: - ZK proof verification - Commit-reveal mechanism - Nullifier-based double-vote prevention - Merkle tree voter/credit snapshots","kind":"dev","methods":{},"title":"ZkVotingFinal","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/ZkVotingFinal.sol":"IVerifierD1"},"evmVersion":"prague","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[":eth-gas-reporter/=node_modules/eth-gas-reporter/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":hardhat/=node_modules/hardhat/",":poseidon-solidity/=node_modules/poseidon-solidity/"],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"contracts/PoseidonT5.sol":{"keccak256":"0x25e62a5772ffce0d64800f000acd2be7f3cff261776de75457980255702d675c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://34611115e91101cac0c31ebfb463d6235eafb952f2d928172ecf211342ce0f82","dweb:/ipfs/QmX4xs6bWETdXgvivVwzB4jdZuykRTwyD6uUirJybmmXzj"]},"contracts/ZkVotingFinal.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1099f2679153fb96993f7b07c0695a42f345f39db71ea048e359e5d3592b0ac2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1216f0404249526832b1830e75c1cf2722c0a45a6c95956829a136219748e8ac","dweb:/ipfs/QmVUR2mdRixMnR1cozpcqFnxNWnRYfULmz3zFQ3cyo8eFj"]}},"version":1}
